description.value: Your polite manners and natural ability to comfort others make it easy for you to break down cultural barriers and earn strangers' trust. While you are in a settlement, when you roll a critical failure on a Diplomacy check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Gather Information]{Gather Information} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Make an Impression]{Make an Impression}, you get a failure instead.
